sourcesContent:
<template>
  <a-layout class="layout">
    <a-layout-header class="header-one">
      <!-- 使用 a-row 和 a-col 将查询和选择栏放置在最右侧 -->
      <a-row type="flex" justify="end" align="middle" class="header-one-layout">
        <a-col :span="3">
          <a-select
            v-model="queryParam.status"
            style="width: 100%; margin-right: 8px"
            placeholder="请选择状态"
          >
            <a-select-option value="normal">正常</a-select-option>
            <a-select-option value="Low_battery">低电量(>20%)</a-select-option>
            <a-select-option value="maintenance">待维护</a-select-option>
          </a-select>
        </a-col>
        <a-col :span="1">
          <a-button type="primary" @click="handleSearch" block>查询</a-button>
        </a-col>
      </a-row>
    </a-layout-header>
    <a-layout-content class="content">
      <!-- 表格 -->
      <a-table :columns="columns" :dataSource="data" :pagination="false" />
    </a-layout-content>
  </a-layout>
</template>

<script>
import { Layout, Select, Table, Button, Row, Col } from "ant-design-vue";

export default {
  components: {
    "a-layout": Layout,
    "a-layout-header": Layout.Header,
    "a-layout-content": Layout.Content,
    "a-select": Select,
    "a-table": Table,
    "a-button": Button,
    "a-row": Row,
    "a-col": Col,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      queryParam: {
        status: "", // 下拉栏选中的值
      },
      data: [
        {
          key: "1",
          name: "John Doe",
          age: 32,
          status: "active",
          address: "New York No. 1 Lake Park",
        },
        // 更多数据...
      ],
      columns: [
        {
          title: "Name",
          dataIndex: "name",
          key: "name",
        },
        {
          title: "Age",
          dataIndex: "age",
          key: "age",
        },
        {
          title: "Status",
          dataIndex: "status",
          key: "status",
        },
        {
          title: "Address",
          dataIndex: "address",
          key: "address",
        },
      ],
      pagination: {
        current: 1,
        pageSize: 10,
      },
    };
  },
  methods: {
    handleSearch() {
      console.log("Search with", this.queryParam);
      // 根据 queryParam 来过滤或查询数据
    },
    handleTableChange(pagination, filters, sorter) {
      console.log(pagination, filters, sorter);
      // 根据分页、筛选、排序来更新数据
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.layout {
  height: 100vh;
  background: #f0f2f5;
}

.header-one {
  background: #001529;
  padding: 0 16px;
  height: 50px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
}

.header-one-layout {
  width: 100%;
}

.content {
  padding: 16px;
}
</style>
